title.paragraph: Follow our footsteps in a 3D Experiment through Nepal, uncovering hidden photos and moments from our two-week trek as you go.

tutorial.one: Navigate your mouse to the zone and hold click to expose it.
tutorial.two: Use your mouse scroll to travel along the valley.
tutorial.three: Navigate your mouse to the zone and click to expose the next step of our journey.
tutorial.four: Good job! have fun discovering! track your progress with your travel log! (TODO)

message.later: I can't go there yet, but I can come back later.
message.missed: I must have missed a step along the way...
